title: Recorded Highlights Sound Bugged
body:
Since patch 7.13 all highlights I record have no sound with them.

actually there is sound but not like actual sound of the gameplay, it's just a sound like someone is boxing you with their fists lol (don't really know how to explain it)
anyways is this from the client itself or there's something wrong with my laptop?

PS: all old highlights before the patch sound just fine, it's just new recorded highlights that sound bugged when i record them while spectating my games. 
while recording the game sounds just fine. it's just the recorded file audio that gets corrupted somehow

replies.body: I'm also having the same issue. Its like someone is raping my ear with a little tiny popcorn machine. Audio is completely unusable in any newly recorded highlights, but anything recorded before 7.13 seems to be working fine.

> [{quoted}](name=4n4ld357r0y3r,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=H2rjZyrx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-06-30T18:31:40.851+0000)
>
> I'm also having the same issue. Its like someone is raping my ear with a little tiny popcorn machine. Audio is completely unusable in any newly recorded highlights, but anything recorded before 7.13 seems to be working fine.

And your name though ;D

>Its like someone is raping my ear with a little tiny popcorn machine.



Upvoted XD

I looked into this for you, and it looks like there's currently a bug with highlights for some players.  More specifically the bug seems to wig out the audio for highlights.  I don't have anymore other info or updates on this, but I wanted to let you know our QA is aware.  Thanks for the heads up!
I just got a penta recorded it and no sound lol im glad u guys are looking into this...

Mine has the same problem. Finally had an amazing game and now I can't show it off because the file sounds horrid. I've tried restarting the client. Glad I did a search and now know it's a common problem that has to do with an update. It actually makes sense when you think about it that way :P. Good to know they're working on it. Now I just have to umm learn that awkward word, "patience."

I am experiencing the same problem. All my recorded replays in my highlight section prior to 7.13 patch are perfectly fine with quality audio.  Every replay I make a highlight from now has only crackling sounds with no actual game audio.

hhhhhhh guess that we will wait till patch 7.14  buddys.  No  "PEEEEEEEEENTA KIIIIIIIIRU" announcer this patch .

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
same here. just a bunch of pops and crackles covering up my "PENTA KILL!" from a Twisted Fate game XD
Yeah, this kinda sucks. I just got a Penta on Jinx and now the recording has no audio. What's the point if I can't hear the announcer yell "PENTA KILL!!!"?
Same problém here... I hear some kind.. idk what it is it sounds like lighting in my ears... it sucks cuz i make a lot of highlights

Same issue here. 

I have deleted the replay and the highlight, re downloaded the replay, re highlighted and still have the same issue (audio distortion, popping noise). 

Has anyone found a solution? 

Thanks {{summoner:4}}
the sound mine makes is an ear piercing static that makes my ears bleed

Yes! Exactly this. I was having the same problem and thought it was something wrong with my computer so sent a ticket to Riot support earlier today. Glad to see that it's not just a one off case for me and that it's been brought to attention on the boards.
